public class IndividualJamActivity extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
This activity represents a single "Jam" session. It includes a real-time chat, a feature for suggesting songs, and admin controls for managing the jam's associated playlist.

    • sendSongSuggestion

      private void sendSongSuggestion(String songName, String artist)
      Sends a song suggestion to the jam admin via WebSocket.
      Parameters:
      songName - The name of the suggested song.
      artist - The artist of the suggested song.

    • showAdminMenu

      private void showAdminMenu()
      Displays the admin menu with options for the jam.

    • createPlaylistRequest

      private void createPlaylistRequest(String user, String playlistName)
      Sends a request to the server to create a new playlist for the jam.
      Parameters:
      user - The username of the admin creating the playlist.
      playlistName - The name of the playlist, which is the same as the jam name.

    • showApprovalDialog

      private void showApprovalDialog(String song, String artist, String suggester)
      Shows a dialog to the jam admin to approve or reject a song suggestion.
      Parameters:
      song - The name of the song.
      artist - The artist of the song.
      suggester - The user who suggested the song.

      private void addSongToPlaylist(String songName, String artist)

      songName - The name of the song.
      artist - The artist of the song.

      protected void onDestroy()
